resources.string:
“Hey, I’m Mateo 
 but people here call me Matt. I grew up in Argentina, 
and lived there most of my life before moving to the United States. 
I speak Italian, Spanish and English. I love gaming, and 
I stream on Twitch almost every day. I’ve always wanted 
 to improve my English so now that I have the time, I’ve 
finally signed up for classes online. 
Become a success story instead of just reading 
about them. Prepare for coding interviews at Amazon and other top 
product-based companies with our Amazon Test Series. Includes 
topic-wise practice questions on all important DSA topics along 
with 10 practice contests of 2 hours each. Designed by industry 
experts that will surely help you practice and sharpen your 
programming skills. Wait no more, start your preparation today!”
